src:
Ada Pria Bugil di Google Maps Protes Hukum Syariah Aceh
04 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Agus Setyadi - detikInet


Foto: Screenshot Google Maps pencarian Banda Aceh

Banda Aceh - Warga Banda Aceh heboh pagi ini gara-gara Google Maps. Kalau ketik Banda Aceh, akan keluar peta dengan foto pria telanjang memprotes hukum syariah.Informasi keberadaan foto ini awalnya menyebar di grup-grup WhatsApp di Aceh. detikcom mencoba mengetik kata 'Banda Aceh' di Google Maps pada Senin (4/11/2019) sekitar pukul 09.15 WIB. Hasilnya, keluar peta ibu kota Provinsi Aceh lengkap dengan sebuah foto 360 di sudut kiri bawah.Ketika foto diklik, terlihat seorang pria bertelanjang bulat tengah berswafoto (selfie). Dia memenang tongkat narsis (tongsis). Foto yang diambil pria yang bertopi dan kacamata ini dapat diputar 360 derajat.Pria yang diduga warga asing ini tampak tersenyum menghadap kamera. Dia berdiri seorang diri di sebuah tempat ketinggian. Ada satu kode di tempat tersebut yaitu 'G7-1753'.Pada tangan kiri pria tersebut, tertulis sebuah kalimat. "Protest sharia law," isi tulisan di tangan pria tersebut.Kemunculan foto itu membuat heboh di kalangan warga. Sejumlah masyarakat Tanah Rencong kemudian ramai-ramai melaporkan foto tersebut.Tidak butuh waktu lama. Pantauan detikcom pukul 11.30 WIB, foto 360 itu sudah dicopot oleh Google. Kalau mengetik Banda Aceh, tidak ada pilihan foto 360. Namun jika mengetik nama kota lain seperti Sabang atau Medan, pilihan foto 360-nya tetap ada. Simak Video "Perempuan Tepergok Simpan Ganja di Selangkangan saat Besuk di LP"[Gambas:Video 20detik](agse/fay)
text:
There's a Nude Man on Google Maps Protesting Sharia Law in Aceh
Nov 04 2019, 12:09 PM by Agus Setyadi - detikInet


Photo: Screenshot of Google Maps searching Banda Aceh

Banda Aceh - Banda Aceh residents are in a stir this morning because of Google Maps. If you type in Banda Aceh, a map will come out with a photo of a naked man protesting Sharia law. Information about the whereabouts of this photo initially spread in WhatsApp groups in Aceh. detikcom tried to type the word 'Banda Aceh' on Google Maps on Monday (11/04/2019) at around 09.15 WIB. As a result, a map of the capital of Aceh Province came out complete with a photo 360 in the lower left corner. When the photo was clicked, a naked man in the middle of a selfie photo was taken. He won a narcissistic stick (tongsis). The photo taken by the man with a hat and glasses can be rotated 360 degrees. The man, who is suspected to be a foreigner, looks smiling at the camera. He stood alone in a height. There is one code in the place that is 'G7-1753'. In the man's left hand, written a sentence. "Protest sharia law," the writing on the man's hand said. The appearance of the photo caused a stir among the residents. A number of Tanah Rencong people then rushed to report the photo. It didn't take long. AFP monitoring at 11:30 WIB, 360 photos have been removed by Google. When typing Banda Aceh, there is no choice of 360 photos. But when typing the names of other cities such as Sabang or Medan, the choice of 360 photos is still there. Check out the video "Women Get Caught Saving Marijuana in the Groin when Tomorrow in the LP" [Gambas: Video 20second] (agse / fay)
